code: import{cartActionType}from"./cart.type";export var toggleCartHidden=function toggleCartHidden(){return{type:cartActionType.HIDE_DROPDOWN};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return{type:cartActionType.ADD_ITEM,payload:item};};export var clearCartItem=function clearCartItem(item){return{type:cartActionType.CLEAR_CART_ITEM,payload:item};};export var removeItem=function removeItem(item){return{type:cartActionType.REMOVE_ITEM,payload:item};};
